Name: El Mediterraneo
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of drops of olive oil..
Lightly MUDDLE basil (just to bruise) in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Drip 5 drops of olive oil on surface of cocktail.
History: Lebanese Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Jad Ballout, Bar Manager at Central Station Boutique Bar in Beirut, Lebanon.
